text: Motion

─I'm Madoka Higuchi.
I'll be in your care today.
Photographer

Oh, nice to meet you too.
Just wait a bit until the setup is done.

...No need to be nervous. If there's anything you
don't understand during the shoot, feel free to ask.
Let's do our best without stressing out too much!
Motion
You're a diligent worker, aren't you?
Huh? I-I guess so...?
Yes, it's quite apparent.

Haha... well, that's kind of a good thing.
But lately, I've been getting scolded a lot for overtime work...

Indeed.
Mr. Old School.

Do you need to burn with passion
every time to do a decent job?
Efficient work, huh? You have my respect.
Motion

─Surprised, you had a good expression.
And you responded accurately to the pose requests...
That's good to hear.

It's a shame to just keep it as a profile photo.
...I'll be promoting you a lot with this!

Yes,
but let's not overdo it.
...Moderation? Haha...
...Not really the time to laugh, is it?

Do you just think you can get away with a smile?
Acting all cool.
Huh, no, I didn't mean...

...Well, I guess I do want to appear composed.
I want to be able to talk to you as equals, Madoka.
...Equals?

It might be impossible now, but someday,
I want to be on the same level as your childhood friends...
...Huh?

I'm definitely not saying that...!
I know I can't intrude on your relationships with your friends.
...I see.
I don't know what you understand.
...Do you like your childhood friends?

I don't really bother thinking about liking or disliking.
It's more like a love-hate relationship.
I see...
Ah, but, I see...

As long as we continue being idols,
we'll always be together in the future.
...Well, who knows?

Today's schedule is over, right?
Can we call it a day here?

Huh? Oh, um... yeah.
There's no more plans, but I can drive you home if you want...

It's fine.
I can go home on my own.
─In that case...

............
...Not to the extent of being like childhood friends, but...
...Still a long way to go...
